DeviceQR: Scan QR Code to Register Device
TrackQR: Scan QR Code to Register Tracking
DeviceQRScan: Scan QR Code to View Device Information
TrackQRScan: Scan QR Code to View Tracking Information
DeviceInput: Enter Track ID to Register Device
TrackInput: Enter Device ID to Register Tracking
DeviceInputScan: Enter Track ID to View Device Information
TrackInputScan: Enter Device ID to View Tracking Information
